verses.verse: הֲלֹֽא־ <WH3808> does not חָכְמָ֥ה <WH2451> Doth not wisdom תִקְרָ֑א <WH7121> cry וּ֝תְבוּנָ֗ה <WH8394> ? and understanding תִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> put forth קוֹלָֽהּ׃ <WH6963> aloud

בְּרֹאשׁ־ <WH7218> in the top מְרוֹמִ֥ים <WH4791> of high places עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> beside דָ֑רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way בֵּ֖ית <WH1004> in the places נְתִיב֣וֹת <WH5410> of the paths נִצָּֽבָה׃ <WH5324> She standeth

לְיַד־ <WH3027> at שְׁעָרִ֥ים <WH8179> the gates לְפִי־ <WH6310> at the entry קָ֑רֶת <WH7176> of the city מְב֖וֹא <WH3996> at the coming פְתָחִ֣ים <WH6607> in at the doors תָּרֹֽנָּה׃ <WH7442> She crieth
אֲלֵיכֶ֣ם <WH413> to you אִישִׁ֣ים <WH376> Unto you O men אֶקְרָ֑א <WH7121> I call וְ֝קוֹלִ֗י <WH6963> and my voice אֶל־ <WH413> about בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> [is] to the sons אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of man
הָבִ֣ינוּ <WH995> understand פְתָאיִ֣ם <WH6612> O ye simple עָרְמָ֑ה <WH6195> wisdom וּ֝כְסִילִ֗ים <WH3684> and ye fools הָבִ֥ינוּ <WH995> be ye of an understanding לֵֽב׃ <WH3820> heart

שִׁ֭מְעוּ <WH8085> Hear כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נְגִידִ֣ים <WH5057> of excellent things אֲדַבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> for I will speak וּמִפְתַּ֥ח <WH4669> and the opening שְׂ֝פָתַ֗י <WH8193> of my lips מֵישָׁרִֽים׃ <WH4339> [shall be] right things

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֱ֭מֶת <WH571> truth יֶהְגֶּ֣ה <WH1897> shall speak חִכִּ֑י <WH2441> For my mouth וְתוֹעֲבַ֖ת <WH8441> [is] an abomination שְׂפָתַ֣י <WH8193> to my lips רֶֽשַׁע׃ <WH7562> and wickedness

בְּצֶ֥דֶק <WH6664> [are] in righteousness כָּל־ <WH3605> All אִמְרֵי־ <WH561> All the words פִ֑י <WH6310> of my mouth אֵ֥ין <WH369> There בָּ֝הֶ֗ם נִפְתָּ֥ל <WH6617> [there is] nothing froward וְעִקֵּֽשׁ׃ <WH6141> or perverse

כֻּלָּ֣ם <WH3605> are all נְ֭כֹחִים <WH5228> They [are] all plain לַמֵּבִ֑ין <WH995> to him that understandeth וִֽ֝ישָׁרִ֗ים <WH3477> and right לְמֹ֣צְאֵי <WH4672> to them that find דָֽעַת׃ <WH1847> knowledge

קְחֽוּ־ <WH3947> Receive מוּסָרִ֥י <WH4148> my instruction וְאַל־ <WH408> and not כָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> and not silver וְ֝דַ֗עַת <WH1847> and knowledge מֵחָר֥וּץ <WH2742> gold נִבְחָֽר׃ <WH977> rather than choice

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for טוֹבָ֣ה <WH2896> [is] better חָ֭כְמָה <WH2451> For wisdom מִפְּנִינִ֑ים <WH6443> than rubies וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all חֲ֝פָצִ֗ים <WH2656> and all the things that may be desired לֹ֣א <WH3808> cannot יִֽשְׁווּ־ <WH7737> are not to be compared בָֽהּ׃

אֲ‍ֽנִי־ <WH589> I חָ֭כְמָה <WH2451> I wisdom שָׁכַ֣נְתִּי <WH7931> dwell עָרְמָ֑ה <WH6195> with prudence וְדַ֖עַת <WH1847> knowledge מְזִמּ֣וֹת <WH4209> of witty inventions אֶמְצָֽא׃ <WH4672> and find out

יִֽרְאַ֣ת <WH3374> The fear יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> of the LORD שְֽׂנֹ֫את <WH8130> [is] to hate רָ֥ע <WH7451> evil גֵּ֘אָ֤ה <WH1344> pride וְגָא֨וֹן ׀ <WH1347> and arrogancy וְדֶ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> way רָ֭ע <WH7451> and the evil וּפִ֨י <WH6310> mouth תַהְפֻּכ֬וֹת <WH8419> and the froward שָׂנֵֽאתִי׃ <WH8130> do I hate
לִֽי־ עֵ֭צָה <WH6098> Counsel וְתוּשִׁיָּ֑ה <WH8454> [is] mine and sound wisdom אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am בִ֝ינָ֗ה <WH998> I [am] understanding לִ֣י גְבוּרָֽה׃ <WH1369> I have strength
בִּ֭י מְלָכִ֣ים <WH4428> By me kings יִמְלֹ֑כוּ <WH4427> reign וְ֝רוֹזְנִ֗ים <WH7336> and princes יְחֹ֣קְקוּ <WH2710> decree צֶֽדֶק׃ <WH6664> justice
בִּ֭י שָׂרִ֣ים <WH8269> By me princes יָשֹׂ֑רוּ <WH8323> rule וּ֝נְדִיבִ֗ים <WH5081> and nobles כָּל־ <WH3605> All שֹׁ֥פְטֵי <WH8199> [even] all the judges צֶֽדֶק׃ <WH776> of the earth
אֲ֭נִי <WH589> I [אֹהֲבֶיהָ כ] (אֹהֲבַ֣י <WH157> love ק) אֵהָ֑ב <WH157> I love וּ֝מְשַׁחֲרַ֗י <WH7836> me and those that seek me early יִמְצָאֻֽנְנִי׃ <WH4672> shall find
עֹֽשֶׁר־ <WH6239> Riches וְכָב֥וֹד <WH3519> and honour אִתִּ֑י <WH854> for ה֥וֹן <WH1952> riches עָ֝תֵ֗ק <WH6276> [are] with me [yea] durable וּצְדָקָֽה׃ <WH6666> and righteousness

ט֣וֹב <WH2896> [is] better פִּ֭רְיִי <WH6529> My fruit מֵחָר֣וּץ <WH2742> than gold וּמִפָּ֑ז <WH6337> yea than fine gold וּ֝תְבוּאָתִ֗י <WH8393> and my revenue מִכֶּ֥סֶף <WH3701> silver נִבְחָֽר׃ <WH977> than choice
בְּאֹֽרַח־ <WH734> in the way צְדָקָ֥ה <WH6666> of righteousness אֲהַלֵּ֑ך <WH1980> I lead בְּ֝ת֗וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst נְתִיב֥וֹת <WH5410> of the paths מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> of judgment
לְהַנְחִ֖יל <WH5157> me to inherit אֹהֲבַ֥י ׀ <WH157> That I may cause those that love יֵ֑שׁ <WH3426> substance וְאֹצְרֹ֖תֵיהֶ֣ם <WH214> their treasures אֲמַלֵּֽא׃ <WH4390> and I will fill פ
יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> The LORD קָ֭נָנִי <WH7069> possessed רֵאשִׁ֣ית <WH7225> me in the beginning דַּרְכּ֑וֹ <WH1870> of his way קֶ֖דֶם <WH6924> before מִפְעָלָ֣יו <WH4659> his works מֵאָֽז׃ <WH227> From
מֵ֭עוֹלָם <WH5769> from everlasting נִסַּ֥כְתִּי <WH5258> I was set up מֵרֹ֗אשׁ <WH7218> from the beginning מִקַּדְמֵי־ <WH6924> or ever אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the earth

בְּאֵין־ <WH369> there תְּהֹמ֥וֹת <WH8415> When [there were] no depths חוֹלָ֑לְתִּי <WH2342> I was brought forth בְּאֵ֥ין <WH369> were no מַ֝עְיָנ֗וֹת <WH4599> when [there were] no fountains נִכְבַּדֵּי־ <WH3513> abounding מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> with water
בְּטֶ֣רֶם <WH2962> Before הָרִ֣ים <WH2022> Before the mountains הָטְבָּ֑עוּ <WH2883> were settled לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before גְבָע֣וֹת <WH1389> the hills חוֹלָֽלְתִּי׃ <WH2342> was I brought forth

עַד־ <WH5704> While לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor עָ֭שָׂה <WH6213> While as yet he had not made אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> the earth וְחוּצ֑וֹת <WH2351> nor the fields וְ֝רֹ֗אשׁ <WH7218> nor the highest part עָפְר֥וֹת <WH6083> of the dust תֵּבֵֽל׃ <WH8398> of the world

בַּהֲכִינ֣וֹ <WH3559> When he prepared שָׁ֭מַיִם <WH8064> the heavens שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> was there אָ֑נִי <WH589> he בְּח֥וּקוֹ <WH2710> I [was] there when he set ח֝֗וּג <WH2329> a compass עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> upon the face תְהֽוֹם׃ <WH8415> of the depth

בְּאַמְּצ֣וֹ <WH553> When he established שְׁחָקִ֣ים <WH7834> the clouds מִמָּ֑עַל <WH4605> above בַּ֝עֲז֗וֹז <WH5810> when he strengthened עִינ֥וֹת <WH5869> the fountains תְּהוֹם׃ <WH8415> of the deep

בְּשׂ֘וּמ֤וֹ <WH7760> When he gave לַיָּ֨ם ׀ <WH3220> to the sea חֻקּ֗וֹ <WH2706> his decree וּ֭מַיִם <WH4325> that the waters לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יַֽעַבְרוּ־ <WH5674> should not pass פִ֑יו <WH6310> his commandment בְּ֝חוּק֗וֹ <WH2710> when he appointed מ֣וֹסְדֵי <WH4144> the foundations אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

וָֽאֶהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become אֶצְל֗וֹ <WH681> Then I was by him אָ֫מ֥וֹן <WH525> [as] one brought up וָֽאֶהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become שַׁ֭עֲשֻׁעִים <WH8191> [his] delight י֤וֹם ׀ <WH3117> was daily י֑וֹם <WH3117> was daily מְשַׂחֶ֖קֶת <WH7832> rejoicing לְפָנָ֣יו <WH6440> before בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all manner עֵֽת׃ <WH6256> always

מְ֭שַׂחֶקֶת <WH7832> Rejoicing בְּתֵבֵ֣ל <WH8398> in the habitable part אַרְצ֑וֹ <WH776> of his earth וְ֝שַׁעֲשֻׁעַ֗י <WH8191> and my delights אֶת־ <WH854> in בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> [were] with the sons אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of men פ

וְעַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> Now בָ֭נִים <WH1121> unto me O ye children שִׁמְעוּ־ <WH8085> Now therefore hearken לִ֑י וְ֝אַשְׁרֵ֗י <WH835> for blessed דְּרָכַ֥י <WH1870> my ways יִשְׁמֹֽרוּ׃ <WH8104> [are they that] keep
שִׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> Hear מוּסָ֥ר <WH4148> instruction וַחֲכָ֗מוּ <WH2449> and be wise וְאַל־ <WH408> not תִּפְרָֽעוּ׃ <WH6544> and refuse

אַ֥שְֽׁרֵי <WH835> Blessed אָדָם֮ <WH120> [is] the man שֹׁמֵ֪עַֽ֫ <WH8085> that heareth לִ֥י לִשְׁקֹ֣ד <WH8245> me watching עַל־ <WH5921> at דַּ֭לְתֹתַי <WH1817> at my gates י֤וֹם ׀ <WH3117> daily י֑וֹם <WH3117> daily לִ֝שְׁמֹ֗ר <WH8104> waiting מְזוּזֹ֥ת <WH4201> at the posts פְּתָחָֽי׃ <WH6607> of my doors

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for מֹ֭צְאִי <WH4672> For whoso findeth [מֹצְאֵי כ] (מָצָ֣א <WH4672> finds ק) חַיִּ֑ים <WH2416> life וַיָּ֥פֶק <WH6329> and shall obtain רָ֝צ֗וֹן <WH7522> favour מֵיְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְֽ֭חֹטְאִי <WH2398> But he that sinneth חֹמֵ֣ס <WH2554> against me wrongeth נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <WH5315> his own soul כָּל־ <WH3605> All מְ֝שַׂנְאַ֗י <WH8130> all they that hate אָ֣הֲבוּ <WH157> me love מָֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> death פ
